    • About Keller Williams East Valley


    Did you know…Keller Williams is now the largest franchise in world? KW was “Built by Agents, for Agents” and is still ran that way today. We are a privately owned company where Agents are partners in our business. KW’s Agents ARE our Stakeholders. In 2015, Keller Williams was named the #1 Training Company worldwide through Training Magazine’s Top 125 list in ALL industries.

    What makes our office different? We are committed to everything that we do! Established in 1999, KW East Valley embodies the KW Models and Systems and strives to provide an environment for Agents to thrive in. We are the #1 KW office in the Southwest Region, currently #1 in Market Share for Tempe, AZ and #1 in Listings for the entire East Valley. With a full leadership team, KW East Valley is dedicated to supporting our agents to make the best decisions and developing profitable and sustainable businesses.
